content.text:
# 1966 New York Film Critics Circle Awards

32nd New York Film Critics Circle Awards
January 29, 1967(announced December 27, 1966)
----
Best Picture:
A Man for All Seasons
The 32nd New York Film Critics Circle Awards, honored the best filmmaking of 1966.
Winners
*Best Actor:
**Paul Scofield - A Man for All Seasons
*Best Actress (tie):
**Lynn Redgrave - Georgy Girl
**Elizabeth Taylor - ''Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
*Best Director:
**Fred Zinnemann - A Man for All Seasons
*Best Film:
**A Man for All Seasons
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**The Shop on Main Street (Obchod na korze) â€¢ Czechoslovakia
*Best Screenplay:
**Robert Bolt - A Man for All Seasons''
References
*[https://archive.today/20130125100857/http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=bJgzAAAAIBAJ&sjid=eesFAAAAIBAJ&pg=3716,3069030&dq]
